    Posts by Collection

    portfolio

    projects

    Quantum Convolutional Neural Networks for High-Energy Physics Analysis at the LHC

    Jun 2022 - Sep 2022 , Mentor: Sergei V. Gleyzer

    A Google Summer of Code project with ML4SCI.
    The goal of this study is to show the capabilities of QCNN for classifying the HEP image datasets.

    Tensor networks for QML

    Sep 2022 - Dec 2022 , Mentor: Alberto Maldonado Romo

    Part of Qiskit Advocate Mentorship Program.
    Designed tensor network quantum circuits and analysed performance using different data encoding schemes.

    Molecular Energy Landscapes of HEA in Quantum Computing for Carbon Capture

    Feb 2023 - Mar 2023

    Part of Xanadu’s QHack Open Hackathon, Winner of Quantum Chemistry and AWS Challenge.

    Qlimate: Deloitte’s Quantum Climate Challenge 2023

    Jan 2023 - Apr 2023

    Optimization of metal organic frameworks for carbon capture using quantum computing.
    Runner-up. Presented in the Chemical Applications of Quantum Computing at the IEEE QCE 23.

    Deterministic Measurement-based imaginary time evolution

    Mar 2023 - Jul 2023 , Mentor: Radoica Draškić

    Part of Quantum Open Source Foundation.
    Implemented a deterministic measurement-based ITE to find the ground state of a Hamiltonian.

    Quantum Graph Neural Networks for High Energy Physics Analysis at the LHC

    May 2023 - Oct 2023 , Mentor: Sergei V. Gleyzer

    A Google Summer of Code project with ML4SCI.
    The purpose of this project is to explore the use of QGNNs in High Energy Physics.

    Wind farm layout optimization using neutral atoms

    Oct 2023 - Present

    The Blaise Pascal [Re]generative Quantum Challenge, within the top 20 out of 75 projects.

    Qiskit-Qulacs

    Sep 2023 - Present

    Execute Qiskit programs using Qulacs backend. Now part of the Qiskit’s Ecosystem.
    Supported by the Unitary Fund microgrant program.

    publications

    A Comparison Between Invariant and Equivariant Classical and Quantum Graph Neural Networks

    Published in arxiv, 2023

    Recommended citation: Forestano RT, Cara MC, Dahale GR, Dong Z, Gleyzer S, Justice D, Kong K, Magorsch T, Matchev KT, Matcheva K, Unlu EB. A Comparison Between Invariant and Equivariant Classical and Quantum Graph Neural Networks. arXiv preprint arXiv:2311.18672. 2023 Nov 30.

    Equivariant Quantum Neural Networks: Benchmarking against Classical Neural Networks

    Published in arxiv, 2023

    Recommended citation: Dong Z, Cara MC, Dahale GR, Forestano RT, Gleyzer S, Justice D, Kong K, Magorsch T, Matchev KT, Matcheva K, Unlu EB. $\mathbb {Z} _2\times\mathbb {Z} _2 $ Equivariant Quantum Neural Networks: Benchmarking against Classical Neural Networks. arXiv preprint arXiv:2311.18744. 2023 Nov 30.

    Quantum Simulations for Carbon Capture on Metal-Organic Frameworks

    Published in IEEE International Conference on Quantum Computing and Engineering (QCE), 2023

    Recommended citation: G. R. Dahale, "Quantum Simulations for Carbon Capture on Metal-Organic Frameworks," 2023 IEEE International Conference on Quantum Computing and Engineering (QCE), Bellevue, WA, USA, 2023, pp. 89-93, doi: 10.1109/QCE57702.2023.10189.
